statements: SELECT * FROM court_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_type, filing_date FROM court_cases ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE case_status = 'Active';
SELECT case_name, hearing_date, judge FROM court_cases WHERE case_type = 'Civil';
SELECT * FROM court_cases ORDER BY case_id LIMIT 3;
SELECT case_name, case_type, judge FROM court_cases WHERE case_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE filing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT case_id, case_name, filing_date FROM court_cases WHERE filing_date < '2022-03-15' AND judge LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT case_name, hearing_date FROM court_cases WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT judge FROM court_cases WHERE judge IS NOT NULL ORDER BY judge ASC;
SELECT * FROM court_cases;
SELECT case_number, case_status, filing_date FROM court_cases WHERE case_type = 'Civil';
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE filing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT case_id, case_number FROM court_cases ORDER BY case_number ASC;
SELECT case_id, case_type FROM court_cases WHERE case_status = 'Closed';
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE case_type = 'Civil' AND case_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY filing_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT case_number, case_type, filing_date FROM court_cases WHERE filing_date >= '2021-01-01' AND filing_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY case_number ASC;

SELECT court_cases.case_id, court_cases.case_number, legal_documents.document_name FROM court_cases INNER JOIN legal_documents ON court_cases.case_id = legal_documents.case_id WHERE legal_documents.document_type = 'Complaint' ORDER BY court_cases.case_id ASC, legal_documents.document_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE case_description IS NOT NULL AND case_type IN ('Civil', 'Criminal') ORDER BY case_type, filing_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(filing_date) AS latest_filing_date, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM court_cases GROUP BY case_status HAVING total_cases >= 5 ORDER BY latest_filing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM court_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_type FROM court_cases WHERE case_status = 'Pending';
SELECT case_id, filing_date, court_location FROM court_cases ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_type, case_status FROM court_cases WHERE filing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT case_description FROM court_cases WHERE court_location = 'New York' AND case_type = 'Civil';
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE case_type = 'Civil' ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT case_name, case_type, court_location FROM court_cases WHERE court_location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles');
SELECT case_name, case_status, filing_date FROM court_cases WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM court_cases WHERE case_status = 'Closed' AND case_type = 'Criminal';
SELECT c.case_name, d.doc_type, d.doc_date FROM court_cases c JOIN legal_documents d ON c.case_id = d.case_id WHERE c.case_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM court_cases;
SELECT case_id, court_name FROM court_cases WHERE case_type = 'criminal';
SELECT doc_name, doc_type FROM legal_documents WHERE case_id = 1001;
SELECT lawyer_id, lawyer_name, expertise_area FROM lawyers ORDER BY lawyer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM case_history WHERE lawyer_id = 5001 ORDER BY date_action ASC;
SELECT * FROM court_cases ORDER BY case_number DESC;
SELECT case_type, court_name FROM court_cases WHERE case_type='Criminal' AND court_name='District Court';
SELECT doc_name, doc_type FROM legal_documents WHERE doc_type='Judgment';
SELECT * FROM lawyers WHERE expertise_area LIKE '%Crime%';
SELECT history_id, action_taken FROM case_history WHERE date_action >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date_action ASC;
SELECT * FROM CourtCases;
SELECT case_title, filing_date FROM CourtCases WHERE filing_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT doc_title, doc_type FROM LegalDocuments ORDER BY create_date DESC;
SELECT judge_name, judge_role FROM Judges WHERE judge_role = 'Magistrate';
SELECT lawyer_name FROM Lawyers WHERE lawyer_specialty = 'Criminal Defense';
SELECT * FROM CourtCases
SELECT case_title, filing_date FROM CourtCases ORDER BY filing_date DESC
SELECT doc_title, doc_type, create_date FROM LegalDocuments WHERE create_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT judge_name, judge_role FROM Judges WHERE judge_role = 'Chief Justice'
SELECT lawyer_name, lawyer_specialty FROM Lawyers ORDER BY lawyer_name
